医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现体育活动可以改善青少年的学习和健康东芬兰大学领导的一项研究表明，经常参加学校交通和休闲体育活动的青少年在中学时的表现比不活跃的同龄人更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Physical-activity-can-improve-learning-and-wellbeing-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Physical-activity-can-improve-learning-and-wellbeing-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ac72b5d-c96a-43f9-bf4c-7ac83a4a3bdb Fri, 28 Jul 2023 03:02:00 -0400 Physical activity can improve learning and wellbeing in adolescents, study finds
专家警告欧洲假期风险增加随着英国健康安全局（UKHSA）为出国旅行者发布新的基本健康指南，一位领先的检测专家警告欧洲假期的风险不断增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Expert-warns-of-the-increasing-risks-of-European-holidays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Expert-warns-of-the-increasing-risks-of-European-holidays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d53b7c2c-31f9-456c-93b2-cb27778bf8f​​8 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 03:00:00 -0400 Expert warns of the increasing risks of European holidays
研究揭示了澳大利亚人为解决超重和肥胖问题而实际增加的体重毫无疑问，澳大利亚人喜欢盛大的庆祝活动。一到周末我们就会全身心投入，大多数人都无法在没有一点过度放纵的情况下度过圣诞节庆祝活动。但这一切都是有代价的，它对我们的腰围造成了巨大的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-exposes-the-real-weight-gains-of-Australians-to-tackle-overweight-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-exposes-the-real-weight-gains-of-Australians-to-tackle-overweight-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=017bc038-50a7-4f64-b527-5b8c2e426af4 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:59:00 -0400 Study exposes the real weight gains of Australians to tackle overweight and obesity
新的 3900 万美元政府资金用于改善艾滋病毒治疗的可及性在联邦政府投资 3900 万美元后，没有医疗保险的人现在可以获得政府资助的艾滋病毒治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-2439-million-government-funding-to-improve-access-to-HIV-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-2439-million-government-funding-to-improve-access-to-HIV-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1e91f64-29c0-45c2-9b10-7ce32dcebae3 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:56:00 -0400 New $39 million government funding to improve access to HIV treatment
增强的光敏感性可能会加重阿尔茨海默氏症的症状UVA Health 的新阿尔茨海默氏症研究表明，光敏感性的增强可能会导致“日落”（一天晚些时候症状恶化），并刺激睡眠中断，这被认为会导致疾病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Enhanced-light-sensitivity-may-worsen-Alzheimers-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Enhanced-light-sensitivity-may-worsen-Alzheimers-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be5f5b7e-ef23-4e65-9fce-8df1e84cc4fb Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:53:00 -0400 Enhanced light sensitivity may worsen Alzheimer's symptoms
炎症：衰老和与年龄相关的疾病的隐藏原因弗吉尼亚大学医学院的研究人员发现了加速衰老的慢性炎症的关键驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Inflammaging-The-hidden-cause-of-aging-and-age-lated-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Inflammaging-The-hidden-cause-of-aging-and-age-lated-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54a23f56-2636-468c-b5e5-64308f2fd5e6 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:51:00 -0400 Inflammaging: The hidden cause of aging and age-related conditions
HU3DINKS 项目开发用于 3D 生物打印的人体组织生物墨水生物制造或 3D 生物打印旨在为多种应用创建组织结构，包括无动物测试、药物筛选和再生医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/HU3DINKS-project-to-develop- human-tissue-based-bioinks-for-3D-bioprinting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/HU3DINKS-project-to-develop- human-tissue-based-bioinks-for-3D-bioprinting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b57a0c4-5bc2-4618-ad53-27816f6e0486 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:49:00 -0400 HU3DINKS project to develop human tissue-based bioinks for 3D bioprinting
新型抗体可以使患有难治性癌症的患者受益英国癌症研究中心资助的一项临床试验首次表明，一类新型抗体可以使现有治疗方法无效的癌症患者受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-class-of-antibody-could-benefit-患者-with-treatment-pressive-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-class-of-antibody-could-benefit-患者-with-treatment-pressive-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cdd1fc7-eff8-4ccf-8894-077a03c0c4ea Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:47:00 -0400 New class of antibody could benefit patients with treatment-resistant cancers
研究：7 种锯棕榈产品可有效解决尿路症状《Journal of Urology Open Plus》上发表的一项新研究表明，7 种锯棕榈产品符合身份和功效标准，可有效解决与前列腺肥大相关的尿路症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-reveals-7-saw-palmetto-products-met-the-identity-standards-to-address-urinary-tract-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-reveals-7-saw-palmetto-products-met-the-identity-standards-to-address-urinary-tract-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f0c3df0-1aa8-4b1f-b9d8-7c3ce0bf3974 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 00:06:00 -0400 Study: 7 saw palmetto products effective in addressing urinary tract symptoms
研究发现网购运动服可能损害女性的身体形象虽然运动服在沙发上和在健身房里时都可能穿着，但运动服在女性中受欢迎的一个重要推动力是它与充满活力的生活方式、积极的幸福感和整体健康的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Online-shopping-for-activewear-may-be-harmful-to-womens-body-image-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Online-shopping-for-activewear-may-be-harmful-to-womens-body-image-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b16ce47-225c-4bbe-8ea0-0fa75929fad1 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 23:56:13 -0400 Online shopping for activewear may be harmful to women's body image, finds study
